[[chapter_agu]]
== AGU - Address Generation Unit

The Address Generation Unit (AGU) group handles all memory access operations including loads, stores, and prefetches. These instructions operate on the scalar register file and generate effective addresses through various addressing modes.

=== Load Instructions
